content.question: Historians have argued that all of the following were causes of the Civil War EXCEPT

choices.label: the clash of economic interests between agrarian and industrializing regions
the actions of irresponsible politicians and agitators in the North and the South
differences over the morality and future of slavery
the growing power of poor Southern Whites who resisted planter dominance and sought to abolish slavery
a constitutional crisis pitting statesâ€™ rights against federal power

content.answer: the growing power of poor Southern Whites who resisted planter dominance and sought to abolish slavery

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
